headline: Is Alexandria Real Estate Equities Now a Bargain After a 53.9% Slide in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether Alexandria Real Estate Equities is a bargain after the recent decline in its share price, you are not alone. This article looks at whether the current level actually makes sense. With the stock down 15.3% over the last week, 19.1% over the last month, and a steep 53.9% year to date, many investors are asking whether the market has simply become too pessimistic. Recent headlines have focused on shifting investor sentiment toward office and life science real...

headline: Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE) Is Down 15.3% After Dividend Cut And Buyback Shift - What's Changed
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. recently cut its fourth-quarter 2025 dividend by 45%, announced a new US$500 million share repurchase program running through December 31, 2026, and is facing multiple securities class action lawsuits tied to alleged misstatements about its Long Island City life science property. Alongside these moves, the resignation of long-serving Co‑President and San Diego market head Daniel J. Ryan for personal and health reasons adds a leadership transition to an...

headline: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. to Hold Its Fourth Quarter and Year End 2025 Operating and Financial Results Conference Call and Webcast on January 27, 2026
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. (NYSE: ARE) today announced that the company will conduct a conference call and audio webcast on Tuesday, January 27, 2026 at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Time (ET), in conjunction with the release of its fourth quarter and year end 2025 operating and financial results. Alexandria will release its operating and financial results after the market closes on Monday, January 26, 2026.
